level.heading: Wholesaler's license prohibited in residential-use district.
level.text: No wholesaler's license shall be issued for an establishment in a residential-use district as defined in the zoning regulations and shown in the official atlases of the Zoning Commission for the District.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-298
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following § 25-101.
